revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6204Wg / BR-6304Wg / EW-7209APg |revision=v2 |is_manuf=Yes |fcc_date=08/30/2006 |availability=OEM |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9562040608 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160CBTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Mezza |ram1_model=Z2V64S40DTP-G75 |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305;RTL8305SC; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }} *[http://www.edimax.us/html/english/products/EW-7209APg.htm Edimax EW-7209APg] {{•}} [http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=19&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=5 Product page] - AP/Station/Bridge/Repeater *[http://www.edimax.us/html/english/products/BR-6204Wg.htm Edimax BR-6204Wg] {{•}} [http://www.edimax.co.uk/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=11&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=2 Product page] - Wireless Router *[http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=12&pl1_id=3&pl2_id=18 Edimax BR-6304Wg] - VPN Router/IPSec Gateway
"1244-00000445-01Z Rev.A" is silkscreened on the board.
{{TechInfoDepot|EdiMax_BR-6204Wg_/_BR-6304Wg_/_EW-7209APg_v2}}
These devices cannot run any mainstream third-party firmware. :See [http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Realtek_SOC Realtek_SOC on the Linux-mips wiki].
The FCC ID lists the following as identical models.. *Edimax BR-6204Wg *Edimax BR-6304Wg *Edimax EW-7209APg *GLP GR-F04P *GLP GR-F04PV *GLP GAP-E09g *Sandberg A/S Denmark 130-99 *Sitecom WL-527 *Sitecom WL-535 v1 *Conceptronic C54BRS4 *Hama 62785 *Canyon CN-WF514 *Planet WRT-414 *Planet WAP-4032 *Longshine LCS-WR5-2114 *IC IntraCom 521666 *Startech HUBS-BR455GWDC *Mustek BR-6204Wg *Microtek Italia SPA MEG323 *American Satellite RS-100R
===Specifications=== *[https://picasaweb.google.com/etthtech/EdimaxBR6304WGV20APL Pictures from a '''BR-6304WG V2.0A'''] :''Macronix'' MX29LV320CBTC-70G (4MB) :2x ''Mezza'' Z2V64S40DTP-G75 {{see also|Edimax BR-6104KP|IBoss Home Wireless G}}
